the weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring.

content.text: It is going well. How is yours?
It is going great. I am looking for a new home.
What are you looking for in a home?
I am looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.
That is a great idea! I love to cook, so I would want to be close to a lot of fresh food.
I love to cook too! I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.
Me too! I love to experiment in the kitchen and try new recipes.
What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I like to make different sauces and try different types of pasta.
Pasta is one of my favorite foods too! I love it with all different types of sauces.
Me too! I love the variety of sauces you can make.
I love to cook for my family and friends. I like to see them enjoy the food I make.
Me too! I love making people happy with my cooking.
Cooking is such a great way to show your love for someone.
It is! I love making people feel special.
